name: Snakes LTD
description:
* VR version available on Oculus Quest (Steam VR coming soon)
** Android version available for free on Play store

Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

- Against AI mode
- Classic single snake mode
- Auto Pilot mode

* This is still a work in progress. Next big update will include:
- Multiplayer mode (coming soon)
- Improved AI Brain (coming soon)
